asfelro the Silent was a merchant on the Sword Coast just before the Tyranny of Dragons.
Lasfelro usually remained silent, hence his moniker, but sometimes he broke into merry song or short bouts of joke-telling. He was a reasonably good singer and his jokes were quite funny.
At the start of the Tyranny of Dragons inÂ 1489 DR Lasfelro attached his wagon to a great caravan that, unknown to him, was full of Cult of the Dragon agents transporting treasures for the Hoard of the Dragon Queen.
